title: The Red Child
description: When was the last time you read an entirely new theme of fiction? One that takes you to a new place? Donoho is the master of the unexpected twist. In The Red Child, Donoho delivers adventure, excitement and a new perspective.The Red Child begins on the surface of the sun, in the incandescent heat of a gaseous star. In a civilization that is rooted in peace, the Red Child is an anomaly, a wild card. Raised under suspicion, a betrayal and an exile. The unraveling of an imprisonment and redemption. The Red Child is a fantastic story from a life-long storyteller.
author: Jess Donoho
